inputs.selection_motivation: India’s family-owned enterprises are major drivers of corporate sustainability practices in the country, directly shaping ESG standards and influencing investor expectations.
inputs.candidate_motivation: India Family Businesses are influenced by domestic e-commerce trends, investment themes, sustainability practices, trade policy, climate risk, and household financial dynamics.

proposed_link.motivation: India’s family-owned enterprises are major drivers of corporate sustainability practices in the country, directly shaping ESG standards and influencing investor expectations.
